me,

Considering the attacks people cont=
inue to make against  me on here just 
for having a different opinion of pe=
ople's results, I  think you will 
understand why I will not post my name a=
nd address  here.

Try anyway though.  I don't know how your personal  beli=
efs here work, but 
others seem to get messages about people they've  never=

they've never seen.

I would also  suggest anyone who=
 tries this experiment, to post your 
results on the  list here rather than=
 sending them personally to me - so I won't 
be  accused of losing any.

ns of

Eastern Daylight Time,  
rasterer@yahoo. com writes:

 

I have placed a li=
ttle something on top of my computer  monitor, right in 
front of me. It is=
 now 7/10/2010. I will leave it  there 4 days, and remove 
it Noon Denver t=
ime, on Wednesday,  7/14/2010.

o the files section here, so

download it to  your computer beforehand, so you can be sure I w=
on't change 
it  during, or after, the test.

Answers anyone reveals after =
noon  Wednesday don't count. Partial answers 
(like just the color, or  sha=
pe, or some emotion vibe) don't count. Just tell 
me what it  is.

Best of =
Luck. I hope for this to be a regularly occurring  experiment, and 
I hope =
we all can learn from the results.
